sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_91423f0a0fe212403df9059ce1050eff
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_amiam_k16cce.FileServiceEndPoint</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example</description><name>FileServiceEndPoint</name><script><![CDATA[(function (ns) {

	ns.FileServiceEndPoint = {
		handleRequest : function (context) {

			var path = context.getRequestQuery().split('?')[0];

			var record = ns.GlideFacade.getEncodedQuery("x_amiam_k16cce_fileservice", "path=" + path);

			switch(record.getRowCount()){
				case 0:
					context.write({statusCode:404, mimeType:"text/plain", body:"File Not Found"});
					break;
				case 1:
					record.next();

					var response = {statusCode:200};

					response.mimeType = record.getValue("mime_type");

					response.body = record.getValue("content");

					context.write(response);
					break;
				default:
					context.write({statusCode:400, mimeType:"text/plain", body:"Multiple files for " + path});
					break;
			}

		}
	};
})(this);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>blake</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-04 19:03:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>91423f0a0fe212403df9059ce1050eff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FileServiceEndPoint</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example" source="x_amiam_k16cce">2024cb8e0fa212403df9059ce1050e08</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example">2024cb8e0fa212403df9059ce1050e08</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_91423f0a0fe212403df9059ce1050eff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-04-04 20:30:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_amiam_k16cce.RestApiContextFactory</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example</description><name>RestApiContextFactory</name><script><![CDATA[(function (ns) {

    var json = new global.JSON();

    function logRequest(request) {

        if (gs.isDebugging()) {

            var logValue = {
                headers:{},
                parameters:{}
            };

            for (var header in request.headers) {
                logValue.headers[header] = request.headers[header];
            }

            for (var parameter in request.queryParams) {
                logValue.parameters[parameter] = request.queryParams[parameter];
            }

            logValue.query = request.queryString;

            gs.debug(json.encode(logValue));
        }
    }

    ns.RestApiContextFactory = {

        create: function(sn_request, sn_response){

            logRequest(sn_request);

            return {

                write: function (response) {

                    sn_response.setStatus(response.statusCode);

                    sn_response.setHeaders(response.headers);

                    sn_response.setContentType(response.mimeType);

                    sn_response.getStreamWriter().writeString(response.body);
                },

                getRequestBody: function () {

                    return sn_request.body.data;
                },
                
                getRequestQuery: function () {
                    return sn_request.queryString;
                },

                getEndPoint: function () {
                    return sn_request.uri.split('/').pop();
                }
            };
        }
    };

})(this);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-04 19:25:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6f27b782dbe2d6009569f11ebf9619f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RestApiContextFactory</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example" source="x_amiam_k16cce">2024cb8e0fa212403df9059ce1050e08</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example">2024cb8e0fa212403df9059ce1050e08</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6f27b782dbe2d6009569f11ebf9619f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-04-04 19:25:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_amiam_k16cce.ProcessorContextFactory</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example</description><name>ProcessorContextFactory</name><script><![CDATA[(function (ns) {

    var json = new global.JSON();

    function createPropertyObj(names, getter) {
        var propertyObj = {};

        for (var index = 0; index < names.length; index++) {
            propertyObj[names[index]] = getter(names[index]);
        }

        return propertyObj;
    }

    function logRequest(request) {

        if (gs.isDebugging()) {

            var logValue = {};

            logValue.headers = createPropertyObj(request.getHeaderNames(), function (name) {
                return request.getHeader(name);
            });

            logValue.parameters = createPropertyObj(request.getParameterNames(), function (name) {
                return request.getParameter(name);
            });

            logValue.query = request.getQueryString();

            gs.debug(json.encode(logValue));
        }
    }

    ns.ProcessorContextFactory = {

        create : function(sn_request, sn_response, sn_processor){

            logRequest(sn_request);

            return {

                write:function (response) {

                    sn_response.setStatus(response.statusCode);

                    for (var key in response.headers) {
                        sn_response.setHeader(key, response.headers[key]);
                    }

                    sn_processor.writeOutput(response.mimeType, response.body);
                },
                
                getRequestBody: function () {
                    return sn_request.getParameter('_data');
                },

                getRequestQuery : function () {
                    var queryString = sn_request.getQueryString();

                    var splitIdx = queryString.indexOf('?');

                    if (splitIdx < 0) {
                        return "";
                    } else {
                        return queryString.substring(splitIdx + 1);
                    }
                },

                getEndPoint: function () {
                    var queryString = sn_request.getQueryString();

                    var splitIdx = queryString.indexOf('?');

                    if (splitIdx < 0) {
                        return queryString;
                    } else {
                        return queryString.substring(0, splitIdx);
                    }
                }
            };
        }
    };

})(this);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>blake</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-04 19:05:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9ca2bf0a0fe212403df9059ce1050e96</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProcessorContextFactory</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example" source="x_amiam_k16cce">2024cb8e0fa212403df9059ce1050e08</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example">2024cb8e0fa212403df9059ce1050e08</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9ca2bf0a0fe212403df9059ce1050e96</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>blake</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-04-04 19:05:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_amiam_k16cce.NotFoundEndPoint</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Knowledge 16 Creator Con Example</description><name>NotFoundEndPoint</name><script><![CDATA[(function (ns) {
 
    var json = new global.JSON();
    
    ns.NotFoundEndPoint = {
        handleRequest: function (context) {
            context.write({statusCode:404, mimeType:"application/json", body:json.encode({message:"No handler for endpoint: " + context.getEndPoint()})});
        }
    };
